U8 flash_read_sig (unsigned long adr)
U8 flash_read_fuse (unsigned long adr)

Detailed Description

Driver routines to read (no write) datas stored in AVRMega flash These routines can be stored and executed in all flash space.

  • Compiler: IAR EWAVR and GNU GCC for AVR
  • Supported devices: All AVRMega devices

Author:
Atmel Corporation: http://www.atmel.com
Support and FAQ: http://support.atmel.no/
